import React, { Component } from "react"; class SupplierDetailsCards extends Component { state = {}; render() { const { supplier } = this.props; if (supplier === undefined) return null; return (
Supplier Name

{supplier.firstName}

{" "}
Reference Number

{supplier.idNumber}

{" "} {" "}
No Of Tenders

{supplier.tenders.length}

{" "} {" "}
Total Earned

$4,820.50

{" "}
); } } export default SupplierDetailsCards;
